name: CamelCase
description: matches all words with CamelCasing that have exactly 2 "humps" and start with a capital (e.g. YouTube but not YouTuBe or yOuTube
content:
a b aa bb ab ba aba bab abab baba aaa bbb

YouTube
YouTubeTube
youTubeTube
Youtube
youtTube

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar

Most literature can be obtained legally for free on the web.
Programming Collective Intelligence Building Smart Web 2.0 Applications By Toby Segaran Publisher: O'Reilly Media.
Natural Language Processing with Python Analyzing Text with the Natural Language Toolkit Steven Bird, Ewan Klein, and Edward Loper O'Reilly Media, 2009
Christopher D. Manning, Prabhakar Raghavan and Hinrich Schütze, Introduction to Information Retrieval, Cambridge University Press. 2008. Available for free on http://nlp.stanford.edu/IR-book/
author: nholt
